sense.def:
Justice
je pravičnost pri ravnanju z ljudmi.

seg.quote: The concept of justice is very basic in human thought.

sense.def:
Justice
je tudi sistem, ki ga uporabljajo v neki državi zato, da se ljudje držijo zakonov.

seg.quote: The courts are a very important part of our British system of justice.

sense.def:
The justice of a claim, argument, or cause
je lastnost neke zahteve, trditve ali primera, da je razumen in upravičen.

seg.quote: They believe in the justice of their cause.

sense.def:
A justice
pomeni isto kot
a judge
;

Kadar je zločinec
brought to justice
, mu na sodišču sodijo in ga obsodijo.

To do justice to something
pomeni nekaj obravnavati pravilno in v celoti.

cit.quote: izkazati v celoti, dati polno priznanje

seg.quote: I am the only man in Europe capable of doing it justice, of making a perfect job of it.
